objects.query: SELECT Id, IsDeleted, Name, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, SystemModstamp, OrderApi__Business_Group__c, OrderApi__Display_Message__c, OrderApi__Display_Name__c, OrderApi__Variable__c FROM OrderApi__Payment_Terms__c

SELECT Id, IsDeleted, Name, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, SystemModstamp, OrderApi__Display_On_Backend_Checkout__c, OrderApi__Display_On_Frontend_Checkout__c, OrderApi__Display_Order__c, OrderApi__Is_Enabled__c, OrderApi__Payment_Gateway__c, OrderApi__Store__c, OrderApi__Custom_Payment_Type_Template__c, OrderApi__Instructions__c,OrderApi__Auto_Post_Receipt__c,OrderApi__Auto_Post_SO__c,OrderApi__Button_Label__c,OrderApi__Image_URL__c,OrderApi__Label__c,OrderApi__Lightning_Component__c,OrderApi__Link__c FROM OrderApi__Custom_Payment_Type__c

SELECT Id, IsDeleted, Name, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, SystemModstamp, OrderApi__Account__c, OrderApi__Bank_Account_Holder_Type__c, OrderApi__Bank_Account_Type__c, OrderApi__Bank_Name__c, OrderApi__Bank_Routing_Number__c, OrderApi__Billing_City__c, OrderApi__Billing_Country__c, OrderApi__Billing_Postal_Code__c, OrderApi__Billing_State__c, OrderApi__Billing_Street__c, OrderApi__Card_Type__c, OrderApi__Contact__c, OrderApi__Customer_ID__c, OrderApi__Customer__c, OrderApi__Description__c, OrderApi__Eligible_for_Card_Updater__c, OrderApi__Email__c, OrderApi__Entity__c, OrderApi__Exp_Date__c, OrderApi__First_Six_Digits__c, OrderApi__Full_Name__c, OrderApi__Is_Active__c, OrderApi__Is_Declined__c, OrderApi__Is_Expired__c, OrderApi__Is_Restricted__c, OrderApi__Is_Valid__c, OrderApi__Last_Four_Digits__c, OrderApi__Month__c, OrderApi__Number__c, OrderApi__Payment_Method_Token__c, OrderApi__Payment_Method_Type__c, OrderApi__Phone__c, OrderApi__Year__c, OrderApi__API_Response__c, OrderApi__Custom_Payment_Method__c, OrderApi__Custom_Payment_Type__c, OrderApi__Is_Third_Party__c, OrderApi__Override_Edit__c,LastViewedDate, LastReferencedDate FROM OrderApi__Payment_Method__c
